title: Love Island Australia's Jessie Wynter and Phoebe Thompson show off X-RATED talent
text:
Love Island Australia contestants competed in a raunchy talent show on Wednesday night's episode.

But Jessie Wynter and Phoebe Thompson stood out from the competition with a very racy joint performance.

Identical twins Luke and Josh Packham were celebrating their birthday and the two girls gave them a present they will never forget.

'How do you even do that?' Love Island Australia's Jessie Wynter (left) and Phoebe Thompson (right) show off their X-RATED talent to treat twins Luke and Josh Packham for their birthday on Wednesday

Jessie began singing 'happy birthday to you' as she and Phoebe kicked off their provocative performance.

All of a sudden, both women appeared to move their breasts using their chest muscles to the tune of Happy Birthday.

The pair added some seductive dance moves to the mix, leaving the rest of the group screaming in shock and uncontrollably giggling.

She can hold a tune! Jessie began singing 'happy birthday to you' as she and Phoebe began their provocative performance

'I'm not going to say no if I get that every year from now on! I'll be a happy boy because they were doing some cool things!' Luke said in an aside interview.

Model Anna McEvoy was left in stitches, exclaiming: 'How do you even do that?'

Jessie and Phoebe were likely moving their pectoral muscles, in a manouvre commonly known as a 'pec bounce' or 'pec dance'.

Breast to impress! All of a sudden, both women appeared to move their breasts using their chest muscles to the tune of Happy Birthday

The explanation: Jessie and Phoebe were likely moving their pectoral muscles, in a manouvre commonly known as a 'pec bounce' or 'pec dance'

Reactions: Birthday boy Luke (left) said 'they were doing some very cool things' while model Anna (right) was left in stitches, exclaiming: 'How do you even do that?'

To hot for TV! The women's ample assets and seductive dancing gave the pec bounces a much more raunchy appearance

Pec bouces have been famously performed by muscular male celebrities like Dwayne 'The Rock' Johnson and Terry Crews as they have great pectoral control.

However, the women's ample assets and seductive dancing gave the pec bounces a much more raunchy appearance.

Jessie finished off the performance by jumping into Phoebe's hands, who caught her for a final pose.

Love Island Australia continues on Channel Nine at 8:45pm on Thursday.
description: Love Island Australia contestants competed in a raunchy talent show on Wednesday night's episode.
authors: Shive Prema For Daily Mail Australia
